General.Name: SiamEast Solutions Public Company Limited
General.Description: SiamEast Solutions Public Company Limited manufactures and sells industrial products and services in Thailand. It offers pumping system technologies, piping solutions, materials, process equipment, as well as medical supplies. The company provides installation, commissioning, test run, repair, and overhaul services for pump, equipment, and floor coating; hot, cold, and sound insulation services; piping design and replacement services by PE-lined steel, HDPE, PP-R, UPVC, CPVC, or GRE pipes; and pump energy audit services. In addition, it engages in provision of pipe and industrial tank repair services, and investment activities. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Mueang Rayong, Thailand.
General.Address: 15/1 Rayong Highway No. 3191, Mueang Rayong, Thailand, 21150
